text: ~MvA EqSha si#sIr.Shatiq yaH sa#grAMqmaM jigI#ShatyaqgniH Kaluq vai dEqvAnA$M ~MvAjaqsRudaqgnimEqva vA#jaqsRutaq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq dhAva#tiq vAjaq(gm)q hanti# vRuqtraM jaya#tiq ta(gm) sa#grAMqmamathO# aqgniri#vaq na pra#tiqdhRuShE# BavatyaqgnayE$&gniqvatE# purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqd-yasyAqgnA- vaqgni- ma#ByuqddharE#yuq-rnirdi#ShTaBAgOq vA EqtayO#raqnyO&ni#rdiShTaBAgOq&nyastau saqBaMva#ntauq yaja#mAna - [  ]  20
